EmailTemplate.description: Using it in Auto Response For Web to Cases
EmailTemplate.name: Email to Case Auto Response for Immokalee
EmailTemplate.subject: Email to Case - Auto Response for Immokalee
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Reference: {!Case.CaseNumber}
Thank you for contacting us.
We have received your message. A Seminole Casino Hotel Immokalee representative will be in contact in the next 72 hours. If you need immediate assistance, please call us at +1 (844) 754-7625
Sincerely,
Seminole Casino Hotel Immokalee
